DataElement.preferredName: Text Encapsulation Data Restriction Content Representation ISO21090.ED.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words of something written.:The process or condition of being enclosed.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:Anything that limits; a limitation._Everything that is included in a collection, container, or communication.:An activity that stands as an equivalent of something or results in an equivalent; typical of, or the same as, others in a larger group of people or things._Data only for human interpretation or machine processing.
